comments.comment:
Sri Lanka is at war. It means kill or get killed. 
The first order of business is to round up all the fuckers responsible for the 350 +  murders to be sent to the gallows, no discussion about it. The idiots who let the asshole murderer Badurdeen escape also should go to jail. I don‚Äôt care if it is the PM or any other cabinet officers. Let‚Äôs get going and stop the bullshit that is going on. 
I believe that the best person to run the. Country under the circumstances Is Field Marshall Sarath Fonseka. 
I am in total agreement with the ministers statement let‚Äôs get the murderers of Lasantha and the rugerite be found, these murderers are hiding in plain sight, Gotabe and Mahinda Rajapakse‚Äôs son, what the fuck is the government doing about it. We have testimony of Mervyn Silva. Why is the fucking government doing about it? 
    TIME TO STOP THE BULLSHIT!!!

Menna niyama desapalana ganikaawa,
Hama anduwema lagala hora kapu balla,

Rate sampath pitaratata vikunanawa, ranaviruwo hire yawanawa, me balu wesige putha danne nedda yuddedi manawa himikam rekenne ne kiyala,
 
Mulinma thopi degollo maruwrn maruwata rata karala karapu deyak thiyanawanam kiyapan balla.

replies.replyComment: Oppu katakana bari  naha puluwan ethakota kohomada samayen samadanayen hoeakanne.chandrika baleta enna kalin kiwwe suriyakanda samuha gathanayata ranilawa galleface genath ellanawa kiya a athithaye ada mahindayage eun nitharama nagana chodanawa thamai batalanda samuha gathana,raviyage sathosa mankolla kama ko mahindaya ewa gana parikshana karada raviyawa hire dammada?thamath bai wahallu kiyannema batalanda (aththama kathawa eka aththa) ko minimaruwanta daduwam neethiya apata vitharai unp pohottu slfp  oya deshapalu sakkilinta katawath neethi naha mudalatai balayatai ona dayak karanna puluwan balu lankawe.dan ayeth 2020 kauru akamathi unath hora mahindaya sakkili basilala minimaru gotha rajawenawa aka 100%sthirai a lankawe deshapalana krame data rajithayala ranilawa sujeewala ellanawada ayatha andaman soyagath milamudal idakadam yanawahana rajasanthaka karala marana daduwama balathmaka karala ellanawada?ehenam ithin ira batahiri payai bai kabbo hithan innenam ehemai
